医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
AI 驱动的乳房 X 光检查将工作量减少 33%，提高乳腺癌检出率丹麦和荷兰的一项研究表明，在乳房 X 光检查中实施人工智能可以显着减少放射科医生的工作量并提高乳腺癌检出率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240606/AI-driven-mammography-cuts-workload-by-3325-boosts-breast-cancer-detection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240606/AI-driven-mammography-cuts-workload-by-3325-boosts-breast-cancer-detection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=389e6c58-cda2-4bd4-aa52-1f5de283fc38 Thu, 06 Jun 2024 00:32:00 -0400 AI-driven mammography cuts workload by 33%, boosts breast cancer detection
面部温度可以比现有方法更准确地预测心脏病研究人员发现，面部红外热成像技术使用深度学习算法来分析温度模式，比传统的预测概率工具能够更准确地预测冠状动脉疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240606/Facial-Temperature-can-predict-heart-disease-with-higher-accuracy-than-current-methods.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240606/Facial-Temperature-can-predict-heart-disease-with-higher-accuracy-than-current-methods.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f7271cdb-f860-4885-9aad-ae2c085bc078 Thu, 06 Jun 2024 00:06:00 -0400 Facial temperature can predict heart disease with higher accuracy than current methods
新研究显示，到 2050 年，美国心血管疾病费用将飙升新研究预测，到 2050 年，美国心血管疾病和中风的经济负担将增加近四倍，凸显了预防措施的迫切需要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240605/US-cardioangio-disease-costs-set-to-skyrocket-by-2050-new-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240605/US-cardioangio-disease-costs-set-to-skyrocket-by-2050-new-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a64f87f3-35a1-445b-a861-9a2808208415 Wed, 05 Jun 2024 23:39:00 -0400 U.S. cardiovascular disease costs set to skyrocket by 2050, new study reveals
美国迫在眉睫的心脏病危机：研究预测到 2050 年，心血管疾病和中风的发病率将惊人上升研究人员预测，到 2050 年，美国心血管疾病和中风的发病率将显着增加，而且种族和族裔群体之间的差距也会越来越大。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240605/Americas-looming-heart-crisis-Study-forecasts-alarming-rise-in-cardioangio-disease-and-中风-by-2050.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240605/Americas-looming-heart-crisis-Study-forecasts-alarming-rise-in-cardioangio-disease-and-中风-by-2050.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fa3a879c-291d-44b9-a5ee-b4afadcacd6d Wed, 05 Jun 2024 23:19:00 -0400 America's looming heart crisis: Study forecasts alarming rise in cardiovascular disease and stroke by 2050
低尼古丁卷烟政策如何改善公众健康《柳叶刀地区健康》最近的一项研究表明，即使有替代尼古丁输送系统，低尼古丁香烟也能显着减少每日吸烟量并增加无烟天数。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240605/How-a-low-nicotine-香烟-policy-could-improve-public-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240605/How-a-low-nicotine-香烟-policy-could-improve-public-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f910c8be-061a-4705-a967-3853e986632c Wed, 05 Jun 2024 22:30:00 -0400 How a low-nicotine cigarette policy could improve public health
跨界臭氧污染显着增加了欧洲的死亡率《自然医学》最近的一项研究查明了整个欧洲的臭氧污染来源及其致命的健康影响，强调需要协调一致的国际努力来降低臭氧水平和相关死亡率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240605/Transboundary-ozone-pollution-significantly-increases-mortality-rates-in-Europe.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240605/Transboundary-ozone-pollution-significantly-increases-mortality-rates-in-Europe.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=582782ed-6c06-42eb-918e-2a460e858eda Wed, 05 Jun 2024 22:14:00 -0400 Transboundary ozone pollution significantly increases mortality rates in Europe
饮食会影响多发性硬化症的发病吗？最近使用英国生物银行数据进行的一项研究表明，健康饮食，包括适量的多脂鱼和饮酒，可以降低多发性硬化症 (MS) 发病的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240605/Does-diet-influence-the-onset-of-multiple-sclerosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240605/Does-diet-influence-the-onset-of-multiple-sclerosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9234a44c-6281-41e4-899c-6fc5362688f6 Wed, 05 Jun 2024 20:49:00 -0400 Does diet influence the onset of multiple sclerosis?
蛋白质组健康评分彻底改变了疾病预测和个性化锻炼计划研究建立了蛋白质组 CRF 评分，将其与死亡率和多系统疾病风险的改进预测联系起来，显示了对运动训练的动态反应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240605/Proteomic-fitness-scores-revolutionize-disease-prediction-and-personalized-exercise-plans.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240605/Proteomic-fitness-scores-revolutionize-disease-prediction-and-personalized-exercise-plans.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a317e7c1-ff37-4032-b0ad-4047b52392b9 Wed, 05 Jun 2024 20:33:00 -0400 Proteomic fitness scores revolutionize disease prediction and personalized exercise plans
斯坦福大学的研究揭示了适应性髓鞘形成与药物成瘾之间的联系即使在成年后，我们的大脑也会不断适应我们所做的事情，当我们练习新技能或放弃旧习惯时，会加强或削弱神经通路。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240605/Stanford-study-reveals-link- Between-adaptive-myelination-and-drug-addiction.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240605/Stanford-study-reveals-link- Between-adaptive-myelination-and-drug-addiction.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=47b59909-74cc-4ee1-bba3-b41eb92bca9f Wed, 05 Jun 2024 16:04:00 -0400 Stanford study reveals link between adaptive myelination and drug addiction
加州大学洛杉矶分校研究人员发现调节血液干细胞自我更新的关键蛋白质加州大学洛杉矶分校的科学家发现了一种蛋白质，通过帮助人类血液干细胞感知和解释来自环境的信号，在调节人类血液干细胞自我更新方面发挥着关键作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240605/UCLA-researchers-discover-key- Protein-regulate-blood-stem-cell-self-renewal.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240605/UCLA-researchers-discover-key- Protein-regulate-blood-stem-cell-self-renewal.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=69b68201-8a68-4a4a-b15c-f76612e96e30 Wed, 05 Jun 2024 15:56:00 -0400 UCLA researchers discover key protein regulating blood stem cell self-renewal
